column1: * 1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien starts writing Letter to Rayner Heppenstall (1-2 December 1954).
* 1973 - Actor Duncan McIntyre dies.
* 1975 - An Extrapolation on The Silmarillion is published.
* 1976 - Actor Dean OGorman is born.
* 1986 - Evocation of Virgil in Tolkiens Art is published.
* 1995 - J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work) is published.
* 2003 - Gollum: How We Made Movie Magic is published.
* 2003 - Tolkien: A Cultural Phenomenon is published.
* 2003 – The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King premières in Wellington
* 2007 - Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians is published.
* 2009 - The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood is released in North America.
* 2009 - Born of Hope is released online.
* 2010 - Middle-earth and Beyond is published.
* 2014 - The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies premières in wikipedia:Leicester Square
* 2017 - Death and Immortality in Middle-earth is published.
